---
id: post-pix-infraction-report-cancel-v-2
title: "Cancel Infraction Report"
description: "Cancels the infraction report. It can only be performed by the participant who created the notification."
sidebar_label: "Cancel Infraction Report"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel Infraction Report"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/infraction-report/{infractionReportId}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels the infraction report. It can only be performed by the participant who created the notification.

Canceling a closed infraction report with agreement will also cancel the
associated fraud marker.

### Idempotence
The operation is idempotent. If the notification has already been canceled with the same parameters,
a response equivalent to the first request will be returned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"InfractionReportIdentifier":{"value":"91d65e98-97c0-4b0f-b577-73625da1f9fc"}},"name":"infractionReportId","description":"Infraction Report Identifier.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
